name: Gorilla Warfare
description:
Welcome to my first ever game! 

This short spacecraft fighting simulation will test your aim and environmental awareness. Battle waves of foes until you make it to the end of this 60 second fast paced adventure! 

Can you make it to the end? 

If you enjoyed this mini experience, then check out my Github page to know what current projects I'm working on! 

I am always willing to collaborate, explore new ideas, and learn new things!
